Package dev.kkorolyov.simplefiles

Class Files

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.simplefiles.Files

  • public final class Files
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for quickly working with filesystem resources.

      • in

        public static boolean in​(java.lang.String path,
                         java.util.function.Consumer<java.io.InputStream> streamConsumer,
                         InStrategy... strategies)
        Attempts to invoke a consumer with an input stream to a resource.
        Parameters:
        path - path to resource
        streamConsumer - consumer invoked with stream if available
        strategies - stream opening strategies to attempt in order
        Returns:
        true if stream found and consumed by streamConsumer

      • in

        public static java.io.InputStream in​(java.lang.String path,
                                     InStrategy... strategies)
        Attempts to open an input stream to a resource, throwing an exception only if all strategies are exhausted.
        See Also:
        in(String, boolean, InStrategy...)

      • in

        public static java.io.InputStream in​(java.lang.String path,
                                     boolean failFast,
                                     InStrategy... strategies)
        Attempts to open an input stream to a resource.
        Parameters:
        path - path to resource
        failFast - if true, will throw an AccessException on the first failed open strategy
        strategies - all stream opening strategies to attempt, will return the value of the first successful strategy
        Returns:
        input stream to resource
        Throws:
        AccessException - if all opening strategies failed

      • out

        Returns:
